subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: For nearly two weeks, Kobe Bryant has been locked in a perpetual scowl. But with a 3-1 lead in the finals, the grimace has faded as quickly as the Orlando Magic.
snippet: For nearly two weeks, Kobe Bryant has been locked in a perpetual scowl. But with a 3-1 lead in the finals, the grimace has faded as quickly as the Orlando Magic.
